\documentclass[8pt]{article}
\usepackage[newdimens]{labels}
\usepackage{PTSansNarrow} 
\renewcommand*\familydefault{\sfdefault} %% Only if the base font of the document is to be sans serif
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\LabelCols=4
\LabelRows=17
\LeftPageMargin=11mm
\RightPageMargin=13mm
\TopPageMargin=6mm
\BottomPageMargin=6mm
\InterLabelColumn=0mm
\InterLabelRow=0mm
\LeftLabelBorder=0mm
\TopLabelBorder=0mm
\BottomLabelBorder=0mm
\RightLabelBorder=0mm
% \LabelInfotrue
\LabelGridtrue

\begin{document}
\begin{labels}
 %{ for label in stage.labels %}
 \parbox{4.4cm}{\begin{tabularx}{\textwidth}{ l r } \parbox{1.2cm}{\includegraphics[height=14mm,keepaspectratio=true]{%{{label.qrcode%}}} }  & \parbox{2.8cm}{\raggedleft\small %{{label.ident%}} \\\footnotesize SNO: \textbf{%{{label.sno%}}} \\ MAC: \textbf{%{{label.mac%}}} \\ {\smaller %{{label.branding%}}} }\end{tabularx}}
 %{ endfor %}
\end{labels}
\end{document}
